import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { FaMoon } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faSun } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Navbar(props) { return ( <>
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}
{/*
*/}
) } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, aboutText: PropTypes.string.isRequired, } Navbar.defaultProps = { title: 'Set title here', aboutText: 'About text here', }
